en.title: Cat Litter Guide: Comparing the Pros and Cons of Each Type
en.content:
With so many types of cat litter available, it can be hard to know which one to choose. Here is a comparison of the main types and their characteristics.

Cat Litter Type Comparison

TypeProsCons
Clay (Bentonite)Clumps well, strong odor control, preferred by most catsHeavy, produces dust
Paper-basedLightweight, some types are flushableClumping is somewhat weaker
Wood (Pellet)Natural scent, eco-friendlySome types don't clump well
Silica gelStrong odor control, less frequent replacement neededDoesn't clump, higher cost
Tofu-basedLightweight, flushableCan attract insects, some cats may eat it

Tips for Choosing

Prioritize your cat's preference. In general, cats prefer fine-grained clay litter. However, also consider ease of cleaning, cost, and environmental impact when making your choice.

zh.title: 猫砂选择指南：各类猫砂优缺点对比
zh.content:
猫砂种类繁多，很多人不知道该如何选择。以下对比主要种类及其特点。

猫砂种类对比

种类优点缺点
矿物砂（膨润土）结团性好、除臭力强、猫咪接受度高重、有粉尘
纸砂轻便、部分可冲厕所结团性稍弱
木砂（木屑颗粒）天然香味、环保部分类型不易结团
硅胶砂除臭力强、更换频率低不结团、成本较高
豆腐砂轻便、可冲厕所容易生虫、有些猫会吃

选择要点

应优先考虑猫咪的喜好。一般来说，猫咪更喜欢颗粒细腻的矿物砂。不过也要综合考虑清洁便利性、成本和环保性来做选择。
